OrgName.entry: CROOKES, UPPER WALKLEY, TAPTON AND BENTS GREEN TENANTS ASSOCIATION

AltName.entry: CROOKES AND WALKLEY TENANTS AND RESIDENTS

Desc.entry: A voluntary organisation which aims to encourage local tenants and residents to represent their area and to become involved in achieving improvements. Provides buffet lunch for the meetings and organises 2 day trips during the year.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Wed 10am-12noon (office); 1st Mon in the month 2-4pm (Committee Meeting)

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 10
